Text: Thank you for sharing this. I really appreciate it.
cheers eztv....as usual,top quality,best release...cheers M8
Great quality and thanks for seeding everyone, took a little while but def worth it :D thanks eztv

After 10 good downloads from you - what the hell has happened?
Downloaded episodes 11 & 12 and find they are in a password protected file and you are expected to sell your soul to the devil in order to get the password. This is the sort of tactics that crap sex sites use to get information - often for no pasword!
Episode 12 hasn't even aired yet, it comes on tonight. How could you have possibly downloaded it and know that it's password protected, dumbass? There's a reason for the green skull up there.

There is a large green button that says "DOWNLOAD."

Do NOT click that button. That's not actually the torrent file. Click the link that says "GET THIS TORRENT."

The big green button is a link to some bullshit video sharing site that always request passwords and tons of personal info. It's just an ad; DON'T CLICK ON IT.

Seriously, how long have you been here?
Missed this episode when it aired ... thank you so very much :-)
